name: Parts of Me
description:
Parts of Me is a puzzle platformer adventure game where you play as a robot who wakes up in a scrapyard without any memories. Your goal is to find your missing parts while you learn about the world, your past, and your purpose.

This is a short-game that we made for our final projects in BUG lab.

Credits:

Art & Creative Design - Asude Bahar Fallahi

Programming & Gameplay Design - Eren Tokgöz

Sound & Music - Ali Görman
